200  template <typename ALLOC>
201  void writeString(const string<ALLOC>& data)
202  {
203  const size_t len = data.size();
204  writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(len));
205  for (size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i)
206  {
207  writeBits(static_cast<uint8_t>(data[i]), 8);
208  }
209  }

216  void writeBool(bool data);
217 
223  template <typename ALLOC>
224  void writeBitBuffer(const BasicBitBuffer<ALLOC>& bitBuffer)
225  {
226  const size_t bitSize = bitBuffer.getBitSize();
227  writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(bitSize));
228 
229  const uint8_t* buffer = bitBuffer.getBuffer();
230  size_t numBytesToWrite = bitSize / 8;
231  const uint8_t numRestBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(bitSize - numBytesToWrite * 8);
232  const BitPosType beginBitPosition = getBitPosition();
233  if ((beginBitPosition & 0x07) != 0)
234  {
235  // we are not aligned to byte
236  while (numBytesToWrite > 0)
237  {
238  writeUnsignedBits(*buffer, 8);
239  buffer++;
240  numBytesToWrite--;
241  }
242  }
243  else
244  {
245  // we are aligned to byte
246  setBitPosition(beginBitPosition + numBytesToWrite * 8);
247  if (hasWriteBuffer())
248  memcpy(m_buffer + beginBitPosition / 8, buffer, numBytesToWrite);
249  buffer += numBytesToWrite;
250  }
251 
252  if (numRestBits > 0)
253  writeUnsignedBits(*buffer >> (8 - numRestBits), numRestBits);
254  }
255 
261  BitPosType getBitPosition() const { return m_bitIndex; }
262 
268  void setBitPosition(BitPosType pos);
269 
275  void alignTo(size_t alignment);
276 
282  bool hasWriteBuffer() const { return m_buffer != nullptr; }
283 
289  const uint8_t* getWriteBuffer() const;
290 
296  size_t getBufferBitSize() const { return m_bufferBitSize; }
297

299  void writeUnsignedBits(uint32_t data, uint8_t numBits);
300  void writeUnsignedBits64(uint64_t data, uint8_t numBits);
301  void writeSignedVarNum(int64_t value, size_t maxVarBytes, size_t numVarBytes);
302  void writeUnsignedVarNum(uint64_t value, size_t maxVarBytes, size_t numVarBytes);
303  void writeVarNum(uint64_t value, bool hasSign, bool isNegative, size_t maxVarBytes, size_t numVarBytes);
304 
305  bool checkCapacity(size_t bitSize) const;
306 
307  uint8_t* m_buffer;
308  size_t m_bitIndex;
309  size_t m_bufferBitSize;
310 };
